data.text: @phiIeven and barely anything has come of it. i just wish there was something more i could do.

@phiIeven it’s so difficult for me. i’ve seen so many guns and it’s terrifying. i think about it everywhere i go (movie theater, concerts, etc) and every time i hear about something new happening it breaks my heart and i feel hopeless. i’ve gone to marches and emailed politicians
@phiIeven The only time I’ve seen a gun was at a museum
@octoberdjh yeah literally just when the chance of threat is higher - meanwhile america id making their chance of threat higher by owning them
@phiIeven i’ve only ever seen a gun at the london olympics and another few times in london, but it’s still very much a rarity
